feature_map.eyes: Dark brown irises, almond shape, heavy upper lids, distinct tear troughs, direct and focused gaze.
feature_map.nose: Broad nose bridge, wide nostrils, rounded tip, slightly downturned columella.
feature_map.lips: Full volume, two-toned pigmentation (darker upper lip, lighter lower lip), distinct cupid's bow, mouth closed.
feature_map.skin_texture: Deep mahogany tone, high melanin, visible pores on cheeks and nose, slight oily sheen on forehead and bridge of nose.
feature_map.hair: Black hair styled in short dreadlocks/twists, visible receding hairline at temples. Facial hair consists of a sparse, unkempt beard and moustache, denser at the chin.
feature_map.accessories: Blue and white fuzzy ear headband, silver chain necklace.

distinctive_marks: Slight hyperpigmentation spot on left cheek

feature_map.eyes: Narrowed/squinting, looking downward (likely at phone), dark eyelashes.
feature_map.lips: Medium volume, mouth open showing upper teeth, likely speaking.
feature_map.hair: Dyed bright magenta/red, straight texture visible under cap.
feature_map.accessories: Black baseball cap with red embroidery.

distinctive_marks: None clearly visible due to resolution and angle
